div.div: Texas Lutheran vs. East Texas Baptist

tr.td: Texas Lutheran wins toss, elects to receive the first-half kickoff.
Cory McNeil kickoff 52 yards to the TLU13, Chan.Singletary return -3 yards to the TLU10 (Devin Mack).
A.J. Saucedo rush for 2 yards to the TLU12 (David Jaynes).
Brent Peavy pass incomplete to Lewis Williams.
